definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: He published many articles on bacteriology , immunology, and chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 他在细菌学，免疫学和化学疗法领域发表了许多文章。

sentences.english: At the same time authors examined the local inhabitants with interdermal test, IHA and ELIS…
sentences.chinese: 并就血清免疫学检查在流行病学上的意义进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the immunologic characters of human olfactory ensheathing cells (OECs).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨人嗅鞘细胞的免疫学特征。

sentences.english: The discovery of immunological function of thymus is truly a landmark in the history of immunology.
sentences.chinese: 胸腺功能的发现是免疫学史上一个里程碑式的事件。

sentences.english: Students of this field engage in immunological research, genetic engineering, and the development of pharmaceuticals.
sentences.chinese: 此领域学生从事免疫学研究，基因工程和医药品发展。

sentences.english: Western blot showed the good immunological specificity of the IgY.
sentences.chinese: 经免疫印迹分析，具有良好的免疫学特异性。

sentences.english: Conclusion BMSC had unique cytogenetic and immunologic characteristics and provided a base for further investigation on purifying cells.
sentences.chinese: 结论BMSC具有独特的细胞遗传学和免疫学特征。

sentences.english: Such molecules are referred to by immunologists as antigens.
sentences.chinese: 这种分子就是免疫学家所说的抗原。

sentences.english: One of the fastest provinces of investigation of mucosal immunology in a few years.
sentences.chinese: 黏膜免疫学研究是近几年来研究进展最快的领域之一。

sentences.english: Renal glomeruli had hyaline changes suggestive of an immunologic process.
sentences.chinese: 肾小球有表明免疫学过程的玻璃样变化。

sentences.english: Methods Anti-globulin test (AGT) of drug were performed by hemo-immunology simulated in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用血液免疫学体外药物模拟抗球蛋白实验。

sentences.english: Immunity of erythrocyte is one important part of clinical immunology.
sentences.chinese: 红细胞免疫是临床免疫学的一个重要部分。

sentences.english: The research is in the journal Pediatric Allergy and Immunology.
sentences.chinese: 这个研究发表在儿科过敏反应和免疫学杂志上。

sentences.english: Also adopted the immunology technique while study the toxin of the plant and animal.
sentences.chinese: 在研究植物和动物的毒素时也采用了免疫学技术。

sentences.english: Immunologists are exploring whether autoantibodies can serve as early warnings in other ways as well.
sentences.chinese: 免疫学家也正开发自体抗体做为早期警讯以外的用途。

sentences.english: Research of oncological immunology has developed rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 近年来肿瘤免疫学的研究发展较快。
